ygData.subject: Esme's REST API
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought given Subbu s post on infoq on how to use links in your content, I d supply a contrasting:

I thought given Subbu's post on infoq on how to use links in your 
content, I'd supply a contrasting:

<http://code.google.com/p/esmeproject/wiki/REST_API_Documantation>

which has stuff like this

<esme_api operation="status" success="false"/>
         <esme_api operation="status" success="true">
         <user nickname="..." id="1"/>
</esme_api>

Esme's API is as bad anything I saw in the SOAP/XMLRPC days. I'm 
dumbfounded this can get incubated in the ASF.

Bill
